subdisciplines.name: Polymer Physics
subdisciplines.description: The study of the physical properties of polymers, including their mechanical, electrical, and optical properties.

subdisciplines.name: Polymer Synthesis
subdisciplines.description: The process of creating polymers through chemical reactions and synthesis.

subdisciplines.name: Polymer Characterization
subdisciplines.description: The measurement and analysis of the properties and behavior of polymers.
